name: The Path of Wonders
description:
This game is about overcoming the endless path in the darkness with a bright goal.

Gameplay features:

  • endless flight with obstacles;
  • collecting certain ingredients to maintain the power level.

Use W and S or "Up" and "Down" to move and Z to reset your inventory.

Music by Eliot Corley from ChaosIsHarmony, https://opengameart.org

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/the-path-of-wonder
